event: Austronesian migrations settle the Indonesian archipelago
Srivijaya emerges as a maritime trading empire
Sailendra dynasty builds Borobudur in central Java
Majapahit founded as a Javanese imperial state
Majapahit dominates much of maritime Southeast Asia
Islam spreads through coastal trade networks
Portuguese capture Malacca and enter regional trade
Dutch East India Company establishes monopoly power
Dutch colonial state replaces company rule
